  • Publication Management

Publication Management

HospitiumRIS provides comprehensive tools for importing, organizing, and managing research publications from multiple sources.

Overviewâ€‹

The publication management system helps researchers:

  • Import publications from external databases
  • Organize with a folder-based library
  • Track citations and impact metrics
  • Generate bibliographies for manuscripts
  • Share publications on researcher profiles

Importing Publicationsâ€‹

Supported Sourcesâ€‹

SourceDescriptionAuto-Update
PubMedNIH biomedical literatureâœ…
CrossRefDOI-based metadataâœ…
OpenAlexOpen scholarly dataâœ…
ZoteroPersonal reference managerâœ…
BibTeXStandard bibliography formatâŒ
ManualManual entryâŒ

PubMed Importâ€‹

  1. Go to Publications â†’ Import
  2. Select PubMed source
  3. Search by:
    • Author name
    • Title keywords
    • PMID
    • Date range
  4. Review results
  5. Select publications to import
  6. Click Import Selected

CrossRef Importâ€‹

  1. Select CrossRef source
  2. Search by:
    • DOI
    • Title
    • Author
  3. Metadata retrieved automatically
  4. Import selected publications

OpenAlex Importâ€‹

  1. Select OpenAlex source
  2. Search by:
    • ORCID iD
    • Author name
    • Institution
  3. Import comprehensive publication data

Zotero Integrationâ€‹

Connect your Zotero library:

  1. Go to Settings â†’ Zotero
  2. Enter Zotero API Key
  3. Enter User ID
  4. Save connection
  5. Sync publications from Zotero

Getting Zotero API Keyâ€‹

  1. Log in to zotero.org
  2. Go to Settings â†’ Feeds/API
  3. Create new API key
  4. Copy key to HospitiumRIS

BibTeX Importâ€‹

Import from BibTeX files:

  1. Select BibTeX source
  2. Upload .bib file or paste content
  3. Parse entries
  4. Review and map fields
  5. Import publications

Manual Entryâ€‹

Create publications manually:

FieldRequiredDescription
Titleâœ…Publication title
Authorsâœ…Author list
Yearâœ…Publication year
Typeâœ…Article, Review, etc.
JournalâŒJournal name
DOIâŒDigital Object Identifier
AbstractâŒPublication abstract
URLâŒLink to publication
KeywordsâŒSubject keywords

Publication Libraryâ€‹

Library Structureâ€‹

ğŸ“ My Library
â”œâ”€â”€ ğŸ“ Research Projects
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ ğŸ“ Project Alpha
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ ğŸ“„ Publication 1

â””â”€â”€ ğŸ“ Collaborations
    â””â”€â”€ ğŸ“„ Collab Publication 1

Creating Foldersâ€‹

  1. Click New Folder in library
  2. Enter folder name
  3. Choose parent folder (or root)
  4. Folders can be nested

Managing Foldersâ€‹

  • Rename - Change folder name
  • Move - Relocate to different parent
  • Delete - Remove folder (publications moved to root)
  • Expand/Collapse - Toggle folder visibility

Moving Publicationsâ€‹

  1. Select publication(s)
  2. Drag to target folder, or
  3. Use Move to Folder action
  4. Publications can exist in one folder

Publication Detailsâ€‹

Viewing Detailsâ€‹

Click any publication to see:

Editing Publicationsâ€‹

  1. Click publication
  2. Click Edit
  3. Modify fields
  4. Save changes

Deleting Publicationsâ€‹

  1. Select publication(s)
  2. Click Delete
  3. Confirm deletion
  4. Publication removed from library
Citation Impact

Deleting publications removes them from manuscripts. Consider archiving instead.

Search & Filterâ€‹

Search Optionsâ€‹

FieldDescription
TitleSearch in titles
AuthorSearch by author name
KeywordsSearch by keywords
AbstractSearch in abstracts
DOIExact DOI match
YearPublication year

Filtersâ€‹

  • Publication Type - Article, Review, Conference, etc.
  • Year Range - From year to year
  • Source - Import source
  • Folder - Specific folder only
  • Has DOI - With/without DOI

Sortingâ€‹

Sort ByDescription
Date AddedWhen imported (default)
TitleAlphabetical
YearPublication year
CitationsCitation count
AuthorFirst author name

Citation Trackingâ€‹

Citation Sourcesâ€‹

Citation counts retrieved from:

  • CrossRef
  • OpenAlex
  • Google Scholar (manual)

Citation Metricsâ€‹

MetricDescription
Total CitationsSum of all citations
H-IndexImpact indicator
Average CitationsMean per publication
Citation VelocityCitations per year

Citation Updatesâ€‹

  • Automatic refresh weekly
  • Manual refresh available
  • Historical tracking

Export Optionsâ€‹

Export Formatsâ€‹

FormatUse Case
BibTeXLaTeX, reference managers
RISEndNote, Zotero
CSVSpreadsheets
JSONAPI, data analysis

Export Scopeâ€‹

  • Single publication
  • Selected publications
  • Entire folder
  • Full library

Export Fieldsâ€‹

Select fields to export:

  • Title
  • Authors
  • Year
  • Journal
  • DOI
  • Abstract
  • Keywords
  • URL
  • Citation count

Using Publications in Manuscriptsâ€‹

Citing Publicationsâ€‹

  1. Open manuscript editor
  2. Click Insert Citation
  3. Search library
  4. Select publication
  5. Citation inserted

Citation Linkingâ€‹

[1] Smith et al., 2024   â†’   References section
      â†“
Auto-generated bibliography entry

Citation Stylesâ€‹

Choose from:

  • APA 7th Edition
  • MLA 9th Edition
  • Chicago 17th Edition
  • Harvard
  • IEEE
  • Vancouver
  • Custom styles

Public Profile Displayâ€‹

Visibility Settingsâ€‹

Control which publications appear on public profile:

SettingDescription
Show AllDisplay complete list
Published OnlyOnly published status
SelectedManually curated list
Hide AllNo publications shown

Profile Displayâ€‹

Publications on profile show:

  • Title (linked)
  • Authors
  • Journal
  • Year
  • DOI link
  • Citation count

Deduplicationâ€‹

Automatic Detectionâ€‹

System detects duplicates by:

  • DOI matching
  • Title similarity
  • Author matching
  • Year comparison

Merge Duplicatesâ€‹

  1. Review detected duplicates
  2. Choose master record
  3. Merge metadata
  4. Remove duplicate

Best Practicesâ€‹

Import Strategyâ€‹

  1. Start with ORCID-linked sources
  2. Import by project/topic
  3. Review metadata accuracy
  4. Organize immediately

Library Organizationâ€‹

  1. Create logical folder structure
  2. Use consistent naming
  3. Regular cleanup
  4. Archive old projects

Metadata Qualityâ€‹

  1. Verify imported data
  2. Add missing abstracts
  3. Correct author names
  4. Update citation counts

Citation Managementâ€‹

  1. Import before writing
  2. Cite as you write
  3. Verify citations
  4. Update before submission
